on reading compounds: 耳茸【ジジョウ】ear polyp, aural polyp
kun reading compounds: キノコ狩り【キノコがり】mushroom gathering
毒キノコ【どくキノコ】toadstool, poisonous mushroom
紅茶キノコ【こうちゃキノコ】kombucha, drink of northern Chinese origin made by fermentation of sweetened tea
キノコ狩り【キノコがり】mushroom gathering
藍茸【あいたけ】green-cracking russula (Russula virescens), quilted green russula, green brittlegill
舞茸【まいたけ】hen-of-the-woods (species of polypore mushroom, Grifola frondosa)
